img_above_text:
![Wukong Sandgate 7.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a0/Wukong_Sandgate_7.jpg)
Head back down to the pond, and you’ll find the waterway leads on a bit past several Croaky frog enemies, as well as a new kind of Rat standing by the shore. This Rat Governor wields an electric staff, which he can charge up and zap you from a distance with after a flourish, or perform a backwards jump to zap you in mid-air. If you take enough shock damage, you’ll reach a state where all incoming damage is doubled, so avoid these blasts at all costs and shut him down with Immobilize.
img_below_text:
Past the Rat Governor, you may see a flooded pit below with a large Toad Yaoguai, but for now it’s better to return to where the first Rat Soldier was and look for a path up into the hills that skirts this pit.
![Wukong Sandgate 9.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/63/Wukong_Sandgate_9.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Sandgate 7.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a0/Wukong_Sandgate_7.jpg)
Head back down to the pond, and you’ll find the waterway leads on a bit past several Croaky frog enemies, as well as a new kind of Rat standing by the shore. This Rat Governor wields an electric staff, which he can charge up and zap you from a distance with after a flourish, or perform a backwards jump to zap you in mid-air. If you take enough shock damage, you’ll reach a state where all incoming damage is doubled, so avoid these blasts at all costs and shut him down with Immobilize."
            - Following Text: "Past the Rat Governor, you may see a flooded pit below with a large Toad Yaoguai, but for now it’s better to return to where the first Rat Soldier was and look for a path up into the hills that skirts this pit.
![Wukong Sandgate 9.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/63/Wukong_Sandgate_9.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player character is navigating a rocky path in a desolate, mountainous area. The character is armed with a staff and appears to be heading towards a cave entrance marked by a red arrow. This image follows a battle with a Rat Governor wielding an electric staff and precedes an encounter with a large Toad Yaoguai in a flooded pit. The image serves to guide players towards the next area in the game, suggesting a path up into the hills to continue their journey.
